last_episode_to_air.name: Saint
last_episode_to_air.overview: After Ricardo's death, his belongings are gathered for an exhibition in his honor; Gustavo, his former partner, and his family reflect on his final departure that ultimately proved to be the beginning of a legacy that continues to this day.

name: Commander Fort
overview: An Argentinian millionaire who wanted to buy love - And succeeded. While looking for fame and popularity, he became an LGBTQ+ activist, the first local influencer, and a pioneer of gay parenthood. All in five years.

episodes.name: Celebrity
episodes.overview: After the death of his father, which brought him an inheritance built over decades from the family chocolate factory, Ricardo decides to pursue his dreams of fame. Almost overnight, the show business personality he aspired to become reached its peak.

episodes.name: Freedom
episodes.overview: Before fame, Ricardo wanted to be a singer, and to do so he set up shop in Miami, a city where he can live freely and without the need to conceal his sexuality; his friends revisit his life and bring parts of his story forward for the first time.

episodes.name: Chocolate
episodes.overview: Marta and Felipe, Ricardo's children, look for a way to communicate with him. Eduardo, his brother, opens up about the details of his childhood, his tenuous relationship with his father, and what has kept the family business running over the years.

episodes.name: Saint
episodes.overview: After Ricardo's death, his belongings are gathered for an exhibition in his honor; Gustavo, his former partner, and his family reflect on his final departure that ultimately proved to be the beginning of a legacy that continues to this day.
